sentence.Network_en: Wherever the body is hairless, the skin is soft and smooth.
sentence.Network_cn: 身体上无论哪里都没有毛, 皮肤柔软,且光滑.

sentence.Network_en: What struck me was the hairless head of that boy.
sentence.Network_cn: 让我感到惊讶的是,这个男孩的头上也是光秃秃的.

sentence.Network_en: Which is as white and hairless as an egg.
sentence.Network_cn: 又白又嫩,光滑如鹅蛋,难以想象!

entry.def: A part of your body that is hairless has no hair on it.

sentences.sentence: "a Mexican Hairless is about the size of a fox terrier and hairless except for a tufts on the head and tail"
